obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_60_0: * Ha ha ha..^1.&* So you've begun to cross the GREAT BOARD.../
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_61_0: * The halfway point to our castle^1.&* Hmm..^1. impressive./
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_84_0: * You won't make it a step further!!!/
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_85_0: * 'Cause my GUYS are about to smash you into blood!/
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_86_0: * Lots of blood^1!&* Splooshing blood!&* Very gross and bad!/%
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_137_0: * Hey^1, purple girl^1, was that scarier?/
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_141_0: * Because you're really cool at being terrifying!/
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_142_0: \E3* I wanna be as scary as you!/%
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_181_0: * You..^1.&* Want to be like ME?/
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_187_0: \E0* But^1, umm^1, the new laugh isn't as awful./
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_188_0: \E2* And saying you'd turn us into blood is^1, uh^1, cool./
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_189_0: \E0* ... what the hell is up with the bucket^1, though?/
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_191_0: * It's to put the blood in./
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_195_0: * Yeah^1, I'm not^1, uh^1, supposed to make a mess./
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_196_0: \E3* Anyway^1, thanks for your feedback! I'm really feeling scary!/
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_198_0: * ... ummm^1, no problem^1, I guess^1.&* Haha./%
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_226_0: * ... so are your guys gonna attack us^1, or.../
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_229_0: \E6* ... I was so excited I forgot to bring any guys./
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_231_0: \E1* But NEXT TIME^1, it'll be the END for--/%
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_245_0: * Hey^1, I've just been calling you guys \cYCLOWN\cWs.../
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_246_0: \E0* Does your team have an \cYOFFICIAL NAME\cW or something?/
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_248_0: * Oh^1, Kris^1, we should come up with a name!/
obj_lancerscare2_slash_Step_0_gml_252_0: * Then it's decided^1!&* Everyone puts a name in the bucket!/%
